current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008
		  to authorize producers on a farm to produce fruits and vegetables for
		  processing on the base acres of the farm.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and
			 Forestry

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

header.#text:
Production of
			 fruits and vegetables for processing on covered commodity base acres

quote.#text:
(other than mung beans and pulse
			 crops)

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section
			 1107(b)(3)(B) of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:b/p:3/sp:B
Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:d

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section
			 1107 of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107

header.#text:
Authority for
			 production of fruits and vegetables for processing

Authority for
				production of fruits and vegetables for processing

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:b/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and in
				addition to the exceptions provided in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:b/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, producers on a farm may
				reduce the base acres for any covered commodity for the farm for a crop year by
				1 acre for each acre used for the planting and production of fruits or
				vegetables (other than potatoes) for processing.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:c

text.#text:
Beginning with the
				2014 crop year, notwithstanding

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
that the
				producers on the farm have entered into a contract to produce a crop of a
				commodity specified in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:d/p:1

text.#text:
agree to produce
				the crop as part of a program of crop rotation on the farm to achieve agronomic
				and pest and disease management benefits; and

provide evidence of the disposition of the
				crop.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be included in
				the base acres for the covered commodity for the subsequent crop year, unless
				the producers on the farm make the election described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:d/p:1
Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:d/p:1

text.#text:
Each acre of a farm devoted to the planting
				and production of fruits or vegetables under

header.#text:
Reversion to
				covered commodity base acres

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
recalculates the base acres for a farm, the planting of fruits and vegetables
				under

shall be considered to be the same as the planting,
				prevented planting, or production of a covered commodity.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008/s:1107/ss:d/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to recalculate base

text.#text:
Nothing
				in this paragraph provides authority for the
